41944.name: Adaptation
41944.flavorText: Pray for salvation. If that fails, pray for extra horns or bigger teeth.

41153.name: Arcanologist
41153.flavorText: What did you draw? Shhhh… it’s a secret.

41494.name: Awaken the Makers
41494.text: Quest: Summon 6 Deathrattle minions. Reward: Amara, Warden of Hope.
41494.flavorText: They keep hitting the Snooze button.

41170.name: Binding Heal
41170.text: Restore 5 Health to a minion and your hero.
41170.flavorText: By accepting this healing, you agree to the following terms…

41216.name: Biteweed
41216.text: Combo: Gain +1/+1 for each other card you've played this turn.

41263.name: Bittertide Hydra
41263.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 3 damage to your hero.
41263.flavorText: It's actually only the middle head that's bitter. The others are sweet and spicy.

41928.name: Blazecaller
41928.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, deal 5 damage.
41928.flavorText: For when a flamecaller just won't do.

41872.name: Bloodbloom
41872.text: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
41872.flavorText: Help save mana. Donate blood today!

41096.name: Bright-Eyed Scout
41096.text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Change its Cost to (5).

41286.name: Charged Devilsaur
41286.flavorText: What happens when a dinosaur mixes soda and pop rocks.

41875.name: Chittering Tunneler
41875.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Deal damage to your hero equal to its Cost.
41875.flavorText: Ear to the ground, he carefully interpreted the chittering noises: “You wanna cast a spell? I wanna cast a spell!”

41876.name: Clutchmother Zavas
41876.text: Whenever you discard this, give it +2/+2 and return it to your hand.
41876.flavorText: A bit of a snob: still refuses to drive anything with automatic transmission.

41406.name: Cornered Sentry
41406.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Summon three 1/1 Raptors for your opponent.
41406.flavorText: The Draenei are seriously considering cancelling "Bring Your Murderous Pet to Work Day."

41871.name: Corrupting Mist
41871.text: Curse all minions. Destroy them at the start of your next turn.
41871.flavorText: The most terrifying of Un’goro magics is both silent… AND deadly.

41358.name: Crackling Razormaw
41358.flavorText: Wasn't clever enough to go AROUND the electric fence.

41869.name: Cruel Dinomancer
41869.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random minion you discarded this game.
41869.flavorText: As that old saying goes: "you don't get into dinomancing to make friends."

41173.name: Crystalline Oracle
41173.text: Deathrattle: Copy a card from your opponent's deck and add it to your hand.
41173.flavorText: Being made of light has its disadvantages, but at least it's always looking on the bright side.

41177.name: Curious Glimmerroot
41177.text: Battlecry: Look at 3 cards. Guess which one started in your opponent's deck to get a copy of it.
41177.flavorText: George promised to be good. But it's easy for little Glimmerroots to forget.

41259.name: Devilsaur Egg
41259.flavorText: A key ingredient in all discerning Funnel Cake recipes.

41363.name: Dinomancy
41363.text: Replace your Hero Power with 'Give a Beast +3/+3.'
41363.flavorText: Anyone can dinomance. Just put your lips together and RAAWWWAARGGGH.

41130.name: Dinosize
41130.flavorText: Comes with fries and a drink.

41890.name: Direhorn Hatchling
41890.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Shuffle an 8/12 Direhorn with Taunt into your deck.
41890.flavorText: His mom could beat up your mom.

41081.name: Earthen Scales
41081.text: Give a friendly minion +1/+1, then gain Armor equal to its Attack.
41081.flavorText: You can make your own Earthen Scales at home. Step 1: Roll around in the dirt. Step 2: Magic.

41249.name: Eggnapper
41249.flavorText: Often misunderstood, it's just that he likes to use the eggs as pillows.

41086.name: Elder Longneck
41086.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a minion with 5 or more Attack, Adapt.
41086.flavorText: And so the bartender says, “Why the long neck?”

41935.name: Elise the Trailblazer
41935.text: Battlecry: Shuffle a sealed Un'Goro pack into your deck. If your deck has no duplicates, draw it.
41935.flavorText: Reno taught her that blazing her own trail is a lot more fun than following someone else's map.

41261.name: Emerald Hive Queen
41261.flavorText: She rules the emerald hive at the end of the yellow brick trail.

41309.name: Emerald Reaver
41309.flavorText: Not to be confused with clubbing enthusiast Emerald Raver.

40991.name: Evolving Spores
40991.flavorText: The most powerful mushrooms are commonly found in boxes marked with "?".

41400.name: Explore Un'Goro
41400.text: Replace your deck with copies of "Discover a card."
41400.flavorText: It turns out cards DO grow on trees!

41874.name: Feeding Time
41874.text: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Summon three 1/1 Pterrordaxes and Adapt them.
41874.flavorText: True, they're only 1/1s, but they eat as much as most 4/4s!

41323.name: Fire Fly
41323.text: Battlecry: Add a 1/2 Elemental to your hand.
41323.flavorText: Archnemeses: small children with glass jars.

41107.name: Fire Plume Harbinger
41107.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Elementals in your hand by (1).
41107.flavorText: Good for summoning elementals. Great for making s'mores.

41260.name: Fire Plume Phoenix
41260.flavorText: This is what happens when you use a volcano as a bird bath.

41427.name: Fire Plume's Heart
41427.flavorText: Why does an active volcano need to be defended? To save its ash.

41151.name: Flame Geyser
41151.text: Deal 2 damage. Add a 1/2 Elemental to your hand.

42009.name: Free From Amber
42009.text: Discover a minion that costs (8) or more. Summon it.

41265.name: Gentle Megasaur
41265.flavorText: "Low, low rents! Must enjoy a nomadic lifestyle. Quasi-sentient, bipedal, amphibious humanoids ONLY!"

41262.name: Giant Anaconda
41262.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your hand with 5 or more Attack.

41242.name: Giant Mastodon
41242.flavorText: Still salty about it not being the "Year of the Mastodon."

41328.name: Giant Wasp
41328.flavorText: Float like a butterfly, sting like a giant wasp!

41683.name: Gluttonous Ooze
41683.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and gain Armor equal to its Attack.
41683.flavorText: Three time winner of the Un'Goro weapon eating contest.

41316.name: Golakka Crawler
41316.flavorText: Universally adored by both control decks and ninjas.

41350.name: Grievous Bite
41350.text: Deal 3 damage to a minion and 1 damage to adjacent ones.
41350.flavorText: Ooh. I'll have a bite of this, and of this, and of this...

41885.name: Hemet, Jungle Hunter
41885.text: Battlecry: Destroy all cards in your deck that cost (3) or less.
41885.flavorText: The goblin travel agency lost his luggage, but he's still having a great vacation!

41479.name: Hot Spring Guardian
41479.flavorText: NONE SHALL PASS until at least an hour after eating.

41925.name: Humongous Razorleaf
41925.flavorText: Loves goblins. In a light cream sauce.

41139.name: Hydrologist
41139.flavorText: Murloc hydrologists are pretty rare. Most murloc undergrads pick computer science.

41926.name: Igneous Elemental
41926.text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/2 Flame Elementals to your hand.
41926.flavorText: We wanted to name him "Ingenious Elemental", but he just wasn't that bright.

41401.name: Iron Hide
41401.flavorText: Week 6. I remain covered head to toe with scales. They do not yet realize that I am not a dinosaur.

41353.name: Jeweled Macaw
41353.text: Battlecry: Add a random Beast to your hand.
41353.flavorText: It’s not LITERALLY jeweled. The goblins were terribly disappointed.

41099.name: Jungle Giants
41099.text: Quest: Summon 4 minions with 5 or more Attack. Reward: Barnabus.
41099.flavorText: Forming the Golakka Crater was the end of Barnabus' disastrous career as a dancer.

41331.name: Kalimos, Primal Lord
41331.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, cast an Elemental Invocation.
41331.flavorText: All that's missing is a little heart.

41873.name: Lakkari Felhound
41873.flavorText: Guaranteed to track tar all over your carpet.

41856.name: Lakkari Sacrifice
41856.flavorText: They asked, “And what must we give in return?” Gul’dan lowered his hood and answered: “Six… cards…”

41945.name: Lightfused Stegodon
41945.flavorText: “Come now, Johnston. I think those horns are quite fetching on you.”

41094.name: Living Mana
41094.text: Transform your Mana Crystals into 2/2 Treants. Recover the mana when they die.
41094.flavorText: If you truly love your mana, set it free.

41912.name: Lost in the Jungle
41912.flavorText: George and Karl were never heard from again.

42046.name: Lyra the Sunshard
42046.text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a random Priest spell to your hand.
42046.flavorText: Arise, fair sun, and kill my envious foes. They don't have a legendary as beautiful as you.

41158.name: Mana Bind
41158.text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, add a copy to your hand that costs (0).

41878.name: Meteor
41878.text: Deal 15 damage to a minion and 4 damage to adjacent ones.
41878.flavorText: When you absolutely, positively have to kill all the dinosaurs.

41212.name: Mimic Pod
41212.text: Draw a card, then add a copy of it to your hand.

41155.name: Mirage Caller
41155.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Summon a 1/1 copy of it.
41155.flavorText: Mirage is actually the name of its long-lost cat.

41420.name: Molten Blade
41420.text: Transforms into a new weapon when in hand that changes each turn.
41420.flavorText: It’s a sword! It’s a knife! It’s a swizzle-stick!

41690.name: Molten Reflection
41690.text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a copy of it.

41305.name: Nesting Roc
41305.text: Battlecry: If you control at least 2 other minions, gain Taunt.
41305.flavorText: Roc eggs are great in omelettes, sandwiches, and as bait to turn poachers into bird food.

41213.name: Obsidian Shard
41213.text: Costs (1) less for each non-Rogue Class card added to your hand this game.
41213.flavorText: You know you’re a Rogue when a sharp rock makes you go “Ooh! Dagger!”

41168.name: Open the Waygate
41168.text: Quest: Cast 8 spells that didn't start in your deck. Reward: Time Warp.
41168.flavorText: Although powerful, the incantation is simple. It’s just a jump to the left, and then a step to the right.

41404.name: Ornery Direhorn
41404.flavorText: "It's an herbivore. How dangerous can it be?" - Famous last words

41294.name: Ozruk
41294.text: Taunt Battlecry: Gain +5 Health for each Elemental you played last turn.
41294.flavorText: Between you and me, Ozruk is a bit obsessed with his body.

41866.name: Primalfin Champion
41866.text: Deathrattle: Return any spells you cast on this minion to your hand.
41866.flavorText: Sure, he'll return your stuff. OVER HIS DEAD BODY!

41478.name: Primalfin Lookout
41478.text: Battlecry: If you control another Murloc, Discover a Murloc.
41478.flavorText: Lookout is a self-appointed title that's mostly an excuse to beat things up.

41105.name: Primalfin Totem
41105.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Murloc.
41105.flavorText: Emits a sound only murlocs can hear, which is good because it’s REALLY annoying.

41929.name: Primordial Drake
41929.text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
41929.flavorText: Before he became a rap artist.

41496.name: Primordial Glyph
41496.text: Discover a spell. Reduce its Cost by (2).
41496.flavorText: It's the Ancient Tol'vir symbol for "Whoops!"

41076.name: Pterrordax Hatchling
41076.flavorText: Aww. So cute. Want to feed him another finger?

41162.name: Pyros
41162.text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand as a 6/6 that costs (4).
41162.flavorText: If you strike her down, she shall become more powerful than you can possibly… well, she'll become a 6/6 anyways.

41176.name: Radiant Elemental
41176.text: Your spells cost (1) less (but not less than 1).

41357.name: Raptor Hatchling
41357.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a 4/5 Raptor into your deck.
41357.flavorText: They’re just baby teeth. Lots and lots of baby teeth.

41137.name: Ravasaur Runt
41137.text: Battlecry: If you control at least 2 other minions, Adapt.
41137.flavorText: Doesn't like to adapt unless others are watching. Some minions are such show-offs.

41191.name: Ravenous Pterrordax
41191.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion to Adapt twice.
41191.flavorText: For better results, feed your pterrordax low-fat, high-fiber minions.

41208.name: Razorpetal Lasher
41208.text: Battlecry: Add a Razorpetal to your hand that deals 2 damage.
41208.flavorText: The reason why there are no zombies in Un'goro.

41207.name: Razorpetal Volley
41207.text: Add two Razorpetals to your hand that deal 2 damage.
41207.flavorText: The result of a fundamental misunderstanding of the phrase "flower power".

41415.name: Sabretooth Stalker
41415.flavorText: It's gotten a bit long in the tooth.

41138.name: Sated Threshadon
41138.flavorText: Bet you can't eat just one murloc!

41410.name: Servant of Kalimos
41410.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, Discover an Elemental.
41410.flavorText: He's doing his best, but his mom thinks that if he had just applied himself in school Kalimos would be working for HIM.

41169.name: Shadow Visions
41169.text: Discover a copy of a spell in your deck.
41169.flavorText: This one’s a bird. And here’s a bunny!

40973.name: Shellshifter
40973.text: Choose One - Transform into a 5/3 with Stealth; or a 3/5 with Taunt.
40973.flavorText: Master of the Three Shell Monte.

41218.name: Sherazin, Corpse Flower
41218.text: Deathrattle: Go Dormant. Play 4 cards in a turn to revive this minion.

41927.name: Shimmering Tempest
41927.text: Battlecry: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
41927.flavorText: HATES being summoned for Kirin Tor party lighting.

41864.name: Spikeridged Steed
41864.text: Give a minion +2/+6 and Taunt. When it dies, summon a Stegodon.

41879.name: Spirit Echo
41879.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Return this to your hand."
41879.flavorText: I guess you can say they’re… “soul survivors.”

41289.name: Spiritsinger Umbra
41289.text: After you summon a minion, trigger its Deathrattle effect.
41289.flavorText: She sees the fate of anyone she meets, but it's always the same: dinosaur attack.

42011.name: Spore Hallucination
42011.text: Discover a card from your opponent's class.
42011.flavorText: It's the good kind of hallucination.

41360.name: Stampede
41360.text: Each time you play a Beast this turn, add a random Beast to your hand.
41360.flavorText: Many hunters long for the pitter-patter of enormous feet.

41154.name: Steam Surger
41154.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, add a 'Flame Geyser' to your hand.
41154.flavorText: Explorers nicknamed him the Teapot Elemental.

41324.name: Stegodon
41324.flavorText: Level 40 Tortollan Paladins quest to tame a Stegodon. There are no level 41 Tortollan Paladins.

41116.name: Stone Sentinel
41116.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, summon two 2/3 Elementals with Taunt.
41116.flavorText: He and his friends just want to rock out.

41243.name: Stonehill Defender
41243.flavorText: Briefly tried stand-up comedy under the name "Stonehill Offender", but turtles are just too thin-skinned.

41318.name: Stubborn Gastropod
41318.flavorText: Stubbornly pursuing its dream to become Azeroth's fastest animal!

41407.name: Sudden Genesis
41407.text: Summon copies of your damaged minions.
41407.flavorText: Being hurt can make you another person.

41145.name: Sunkeeper Tarim
41145.text: Taunt Battlecry: Set all other minions' Attack and Health to 3.

41366.name: Swamp King Dred
41366.text: After your opponent plays a minion, attack it.
41366.flavorText: Swamp King Dred, more like Swamp King Dead, amiright?

41418.name: Tar Creeper
41418.text: Taunt Has +2 Attack during your opponent's turn.
41418.flavorText: If you won't come to the tar pits, we'll bring them to you!

41881.name: Tar Lord
41881.text: Taunt Has +4 Attack during your opponent's turn.
41881.flavorText: Tar Lord, man... legendary monster? Aw, forget it.

41194.name: Tar Lurker
41194.text: Taunt Has +3 Attack during your opponent's turn.
41194.flavorText: Hi, Tar here. Long time lurking, first time taunting…

41304.name: Terrorscale Stalker
41304.flavorText: Likes to scare his friends half to death.

41222.name: The Caverns Below
41222.text: Quest: Play four minions with the same name. Reward: Crystal Core.
41222.flavorText: Why can't it ever be The Taverns Below?

41868.name: The Last Kaleidosaur
41868.text: Quest: Cast 5 spells on your minions. Reward: Galvadon.
41868.flavorText: “Impossible!” exclaimed the Silver Hand Recruit, his eyes filled with fear. Uther shook his head, turning the crystal until it caught the light: “Life finds a way.”

41368.name: The Marsh Queen
41368.flavorText: Question: What's scarier, one giant angry dinosaur or 20 smaller vicious ones? Answer: AHHHHHHH THEY FOUND MEEEEEE

41913.name: The Voraxx
41913.text: After you cast a spell on this minion, summon a 1/1 Plant and cast another copy on it.
41913.flavorText: I am the Voraxx. I speak for the weeds.

41257.name: Thunder Lizard
41257.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, Adapt.

41521.name: Tidal Surge
41521.flavorText: Also good for removing pesky stains.

41241.name: Tol'vir Stoneshaper
41241.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
41241.flavorText: He spends a lot of time keeping himself in stoneshape.

41354.name: Tol'vir Warden
41354.text: Battlecry: Draw two 1-Cost minions from your deck.
41354.flavorText: Ferocious in combat… and even more terrifying in pet battles.

41252.name: Tortollan Forager
41252.text: Battlecry: Add a random minion with 5 or more Attack to your hand.
41252.flavorText: In the Tortollan tongue, Un’goro is known as the “Land of the Lost and Found.”

41264.name: Tortollan Primalist
41264.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell and cast it with random targets.
41264.flavorText: I see pizza in my future.

41954.name: Tyrantus
41954.flavorText: Millennia of evolutionary pressures turned his species into the Faerie Dragons we know today.

41315.name: Ultrasaur
41315.flavorText: Evolved the really long neck to spy on its neighbors.

41499.name: Unite the Murlocs
41499.flavorText: Form feet and legs! Form arms and body! Oh. Sorry. I was thinking about Mechafin.

40971.name: Verdant Longneck
40971.flavorText: Always sticking its neck into other people’s business.

41247.name: Vicious Fledgling
41247.text: After this minion attacks a hero, Adapt.
41247.flavorText: A youngster who is truly hungry for self-improvement.

41217.name: Vilespine Slayer
41217.flavorText: 'Cause slayers gonna slay, slay, slay, slay, slay.

41859.name: Vinecleaver
41859.text: After your hero attacks, summon two 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
41859.flavorText: George and Karl! Thank the Light we found you!

41524.name: Volatile Elemental
41524.text: Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion.
41524.flavorText: Currently in an anger management class with Raging Worgen, Grommash Hellscream, and The Angry Chicken. It isn't helping.

41159.name: Volcano
41159.text: Deal 15 damage randomly split among all minions. Overload: (1)
41159.flavorText: Many young shaman summon a volcano as their first school project.

41120.name: Volcanosaur
41120.flavorText: Always fun to say out loud "VOL-CA-NO-SAUUUR!"
